title: ID on this wine label
content:
[http://www.graphic-exchange.com/images/07packaging/pianopiano/pianopiano...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120719092609/http:/www.graphic-exchange.com/images/07packaging/pianopiano/pianopiano14.jpg "http://www.graphic-exchange.com/images/07packaging/pianopiano/pianopiano14.jpg")

Anyone know what that typeface is in the heading?
author: kamolahy

comments.content: Trio, Cabernet Sauvignon, etc. are in Copperplate Gothic

[www.graphic-exchange.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20120719092609/http:/www.graphic-exchange.com/ "www.graphic-exchange.com") is really awesome!!!

Thanks for sharing from that site.

Mikey :-)
